subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Gordon and his Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jimmie Johnson swept the front row for next weekend’s Daytona 500, with Gordon capturing the pole in Daytona Beach, Fla., on Sunday.
snippet: Gordon and his Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jimmie Johnson swept the front row for next weekend’s Daytona 500, with Gordon capturing the pole in Daytona Beach, Fla., on Sunday.
